description: Copies or moves one vault item from one container to another

inputs.description: Optional variable to specify the source container ID. By default, it will use the container from the running playbook.
inputs.name: source_container_id

inputs.description: Required variable to specify where the vault item should be transferred.
inputs.name: target_container_id

inputs.description: A list of vault items to copy to a target container.
inputs.name: vault_id_list

inputs.description: Optional variable to specify if the file should be moved or copied. If Move is set to true, the file will be deleted from the source_container_id after copied. Defaults to False. (If ran by an automation user, requires the automation user to have delete container privileges.)
inputs.name: move

outputs.description: The vault ID that was operated on.
